name: Sprava Cloud DB (MySQL v Azure)
info:
RAW: 30s data z vahy
AVG: 3min ocistene data od zakmitov
STAV: priebezna vaha v zasobniku
    T+ : cas nasypania
    Q+ : mnozstvo nasypania
    T- : cas vysypania
    Q- : mnozstvo vysypania 
DEN: denne aggregaty
    T+ : zaciatok smeny
    Q+ : mnozstvo v zasobniku
    T- : cas vysypania
    Q- : koniec smeny
    QD : denna davka spracovania
LOG: notifikacie

name: Sprava Lokalnych DB (SQLite)
info:
RAW: 30s data z vahy
AVG: 3min ocistene data od zakmitov
STAV: priebezna vaha v zasobniku
    T+ : cas nasypania
    Q+ : mnozstvo nasypania
    T- : cas vysypania
    Q- : mnozstvo vysypania 
DEN: denne aggregaty
    T+ : zaciatok smeny
    Q+ : mnozstvo v zasobniku
    T- : cas vysypania
    Q- : koniec smeny
    QD : denna davka spracovania
LOG: notifikacie

name: Asynchronny prenos dat z LocDB => CloudDB
Ak je tam OK
INSERT statement
func:
msg.topic = "INSERT into new_scale_data(id_scale, row_1,date) VALUES (3,'"+msg.payload+"',now())"
return msg;

name: get next
func:
node.send({topic: "control", payload: "drop"})
msg.topic = "control"
msg.payload = "peek"
return msg;

name: SELECT statement
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT id_scale,row_1,date FROM new_scale_data WHERE id_scale=3 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1"
return msg;

name: function 1
func: return msg

name: Notifikacie
func:
msg.topic = "CREATE TABLE Notifikacie( timestamp BIGINT NOT NULL, sprava TEXT NOT NULL ); ";
return msg;

name: VahaData
func:
//msg.topic = "CREATE TABLE Clean( cas INT NOT NULL, den INT NOT NULL, hodina INT NOT NULL, vaha FLOAT NOT NULL, check_out INT NOT NULL )"

msg.topic = "CREATE TABLE VahaData( \
id_scale_data INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, \
id_Loc INT NOT NULL,  \
id_scale INT NOT NULL, \
timestamp BIGINT NOT NULL, \
row_1 TEXT NOT NULL, \
row_2 TEXT NOT NULL, \
row_3 TEXT NOT NULL, \
row_4 TEXT NOT NULL, \
row_5 TEXT NOT NULL, \
row_6 FLOAT NOT NULL, \
row_7 FLOAT NOT NULL, \
row_8 FLOAT NOT NULL, \
row_9 FLOAT NOT NULL, \
row_10 VARCHAR(10), \
row_11 VARCHAR(10), \
row_12 VARCHAR(10), \
row_13 VARCHAR(10),  \
row_14 TEXT NOT NULL, \
row_15 TEXT NOT NULL, \
row_16 TEXT NOT NULL, \
PRIMARY KEY(id_scale_data) ) ";

return msg;

name: Clean All
func:
msg.payload = "DELETE FROM VahaData;\nDELETE FROM Notifikacie;\n"
return msg;

name: Drop ALL
Notifikacie
func:
msg.topic = "CREATE TABLE Notifikacie( timestamp INT NOT NULL, sprava TEXT NOT NULL )"
return msg;

name: CreateTbl
func:
msg.topic = "CREATE TABLE VahaData( \
id_scale_data int NOT NULL, \
id_scale int NOT NULL, \
timestamp INT NOT NULL, \
datum TEXT NOT NULL, \
cas TEXT NOT NULL, \
produkt TEXT NOT NULL, \
sklad TEXT NOT NULL, \
artikelPKH TEXT NOT NULL, \
kusov INT NOT NULL, \
brutto TEXT NOT NULL, \
netto TEXT NOT NULL, \
tara TEXT NOT NULL, \
na1 INT NOT NULL, \
na2 INT NOT NULL, \
na3 INT NOT NULL, \
na4 INT NOT NULL, \
sarza TEXT NOT NULL, \
kodProdukt TEXT NOT NULL, \
operator TEXT NOT NULL); ";

return msg;

name: Drop ALL
Clean All
OK=0
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT rowid, * FROM VahaData WHERE id_scale_data = \"0\" LIMIT 10";
return msg;

name: Write CloudDB
func:
//msg.topic = "INSERT INTO vahadata(id_scale_data, id_Loc, id_scale, timestamp, row_1, row_2, row_3, row_4, row_5, row_6, row_7, row_8, row_9, row_10, row_11, row_12, row_13, row_14, row_15, row_16) VALUES( " + 
msg.idLoc = msg.payload.rowid;

msg.topic = "INSERT INTO new_scale_data( id_scale, row_1, row_2, row_3, row_4, row_5, row_6, row_7, row_8, row_9, row_10, row_11, row_12, row_13, row_14, row_15, row_16,date) VALUES( " +
    //msg.payload.id_scale_data + "," + 
    msg.payload.id_scale + ", " +
    "\"" + msg.payload.datum + "\", " +
    "\"" + msg.payload.cas + "\", " +
    "\"" + msg.payload.produkt + "\", " +
    "\"" + msg.payload.sklad + "\", " +
    "\"" + msg.payload.artikelPKH + "\", " +
    "\"" + msg.payload.kusov + "\", " +
    "\"" + msg.payload.brutto + "\", " + 
    "\"" + msg.payload.netto + "\", " + 
    "\"" + msg.payload.tara + "\", " +
    "\"" + msg.payload.na1 + "\", " +
    "\"" + msg.payload.na2 + "\", " +
    "\"" + msg.payload.na3 + "\", " +
    "\"" + msg.payload.na4 + "\", " +
    "\"" + msg.payload.sarza + "\", " +
    "\"" + msg.payload.kodProdukt + "\", " +
    "\"" + msg.payload.operator + "\", " +
    "now()" + " );";
     

return msg;

/*
    I       msg.payload.id_scale_data   ---AUTOINKREMENT---
    I       msg.payload.id_Loc          ---ID z LocDB---
    I       msg.payload.id_scale
    I       msg.payload.timestamp
    T   1   msg.payload.datum
    T   2   msg.payload.cas
    T   3   msg.payload.product
    T   4   msg.payload.sklad
    T   5   msg.payload.artikelPKH
    F   6   msg.payload.kusov
    F   7-9 msg.payload.brutto msg.payload.netto  msg.payload.tara
    V   10-13 msg.payload.na1, 2, 3, 4
    T   14  msg.payload.sarza
    T   15  msg.payload.kodProdukt 
    T   16  msg.payload.operator 
    */

sql:
